actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation added by the Revenue Act of 1978.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions added by the Revenue Act of 1978 which require the inclusion in gross income of certain amounts of unemployment compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation added by the Revenue Act of 1978.
